item.title: Schedule of Events
item.description: Call For Papers opens February 1st. Call For Papers closes March 8th. Speakers selected and notified on or before March 22nd. Registration opens March 28th. Regular registration (includes t-shirt) closes May 1st or until sold out, whichever is sooner. Late registration (attendance only) closes the day before BSidesFortWayne. BSidesFortWayne â€“ Saturday, May 21 at Sweetwater Sound.
